alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 10 at 4:30AM EST until January 10 at 8:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southern Connecticut and southeast New York. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...With saturated grounds, 50 mph wind gusts may easily down some trees.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven
